article.title: Computer-Output Microfilm
article.author: Bolef, D.
article.text: Computer output in microfilm or microfiche form (COM) rather than computer printout and conventional forms of reproduction is one possible way special librarians can reduce their costs, space needs, and time lags. COM is described among with the equipment needed, where to find it, and experiences of one special library. Possible savins are compared with additional reading and special reproduction equipment required as well as the advantages and disadvantages to be weighed in deciding on COM.
